tasks.title: Analyze Current Directory Structure
tasks.description: Document the current structure of helm/configs/ and identify all files that need to be moved
tasks.details: Review the contents of helm/configs/ directory including data/ subdirectory and osdfir-lab-values.yaml file. Document the exact structure to ensure nothing is lost during the move.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify all files are identified and documented before proceeding with the move

tasks.title: Identify All Code References
tasks.description: Find all references to helm/configs paths in the codebase that need updating
tasks.details: Search through all files to find references to helm/configs. Based on analysis, the main references are in terraform/main.tf with 3 specific path references that need updating.
tasks.testStrategy: Use grep and codebase search to ensure all references are found

tasks.title: Create New Directory Structure
tasks.description: Create configs/ directory at project root and move all files from helm/configs/
tasks.details: Move helm/configs/ to configs/ at the project root. Preserve all subdirectory structure including data/ folder and all configuration files.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify all files moved correctly and no files were lost or corrupted

tasks.title: Update Terraform Path References
tasks.description: Update all path references in terraform/main.tf to point to new configs location
tasks.details: Update 3 specific references in terraform/main.tf: fileset path, tar command path, and values file path. Change helm/configs references to configs.
tasks.testStrategy: Run terraform validate to ensure syntax is correct

tasks.title: Test Deployment Functionality
tasks.description: Test that the deployment still works correctly with the new directory structure
tasks.details: Run terraform plan/apply to verify that the configuration files are properly accessed from the new location and deployment works as expected.
tasks.testStrategy: Successful terraform deployment without errors and all pods running correctly

tasks.title: Update Git Tracking
tasks.description: Properly stage the directory move and file changes for git commit
tasks.details: Remove old helm/configs from git tracking and add new configs/ directory. Update terraform/main.tf changes.
tasks.testStrategy: Git status shows proper file moves and no missing files

tasks.title: Documentation Update
tasks.description: Update any documentation that references the old configs location
tasks.details: Check README and other documentation for any references to helm/configs that should be updated to configs/.
tasks.testStrategy: Search through all .md files to ensure no outdated references remain

metadata.description: Tasks for reorganizing OSDFIR Lab configs directory structure
